Entity.information: Capabilities shared between Parts, Sketches and Landmarks.

createFromFile.information: Adds geometry to a part from a file. If the part does not exist, this will create it.

rename.information: Rename the entity, with an option to rename linked landmarks and underlying data.

delete.information: Delete the entity from the scene. You may need to delete an associated joint or other features.

isVisible.information: Returns whether the entity is visible in the scene.

setVisible.information: Toggles visibility of an entity in the scene.

apply.information: Apply any modifications. This is application specific, but a general function is that it finalizes any changes made to an entity.

getNativeInstance.information: Get the native API's object instance. For example, in Blender API, this would return a bpy.object instance.

getLocationWorld.information: Get the entities XYZ location relative to World Space.

getLocationLocal.information: Get the entities XYZ location relative to Local Space.

export.information: Export Entity. Use the filePath to control the export type, e.g. '/path/to/cube.obj' or '/path/to/curve.svg'

mirror.information: Mirror an existing entity with respect to a landmark. If a name is provided, the mirror becomes a separate entity.

translateXYZ.information: Translate in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

translateX.information: Translate in the X direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

translateY.information: Translate in the Y direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

translateZ.information: Translate in the z direction. Pass a number or Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to translate to a specific length.

scaleXYZ.information: Scale in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scaleX.information: Scale in the X direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scaleY.information: Scale in the Y direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scaleZ.information: Scale in the Z direction. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

scaleXByFactor.information: Scale in the X direction by a multiple.

scaleYByFactor.information: Scale in the Y direction by a multiple.

scaleZByFactor.information: Scale in the X direction by a multiple.

scaleKeepAspectRatio.information: Scale in one axis and maintain the others. Pass a Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

rotateXYZ.information: Rotate in the XYZ direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotateX.information: Rotate in the X direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotateY.information: Rotate in the Y direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

rotateZ.information: Rotate in the Z direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

twist.information: AKA Helix, Screw. Revolve an entity

remesh.information: Remeshing should be capable of voxel or vertex based reconstruction, including decimating unnecessary vertices (if applicable).

createLandmark.information: Shortcut for creating and assigning a landmark to this entity. Returns a Landmark instance.

getBoundingBox.information: Get the Boundary Box around the entity.

getDimensions.information: Get the length span in each coordinate axis (X,Y,Z).

createCube.information: Adds cuboid geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

createCone.information: Adds cone geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

createCylinder.information: Adds cylinder geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

createTorus.information: Adds torus geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

createSphere.information: Adds sphere geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

createGear.information: Adds gear geometry to a part.

keywordArguments.information: key-value pairs to pass onto the native api

clone.information: Clone an existing Part with its geometry and properties. Returns the new Part.

hollow.information: Remove vertices, if necessary, until the part has a specified wall thickness.

setMaterial.information: Assign a known material to this part.

isCollidingWithPart.information: Check if this part is colliding with another.

selectVertexNearLandmark.information: Select the vertex closest to a Landmark on the entity (in UI).

selectEdgeNearLandmark.information: Select an edge closest to a landmark on the entity (in UI).

selectFaceNearLandmark.information: Select a face closest to a landmark on the entity (in UI).

Sketch.information: Capabilities related to adding, multiplying, and/or modifying a curve.

clone.information: Clone an existing sketch with its geometry and properties. Returns the new Sketch.

revolve.information: Revolve a Sketch around another Entity or Landmark

thicken.information: Uniformly add a wall around a sketch.

extrude.information: Extrude a curve by a specified length. Returns a Part type.

sweep.information: Extrude this  curve along the path of another

profile.information: Bend this curve along the path of another

createLineBetweenPoints.information: Create a line between two points

createSegment.information: Create a segment (intersection of two circles)

Landmark.information: Landmarks are named positions on an entity.

getLandmarkEntityName.information: Get the landmark object name in the scene, which may be different to the name of the landmark when it was first created. For example, the generated name may be {parentName}_{landmarkName}.

getParentEntity.information: Get the name of the entity this landmark belongs to.

delete.information: Delete the landmark from the scene.

isVisible.information: Returns whether the landmark is visible in the scene.

setVisible.information: Toggles visibility of an landmark in the scene.

getNativeInstance.information: Get the native API's object instance. For example, in Blender API, this would return a bpy.object instance.

getLocationWorld.information: Get the landmark XYZ location relative to World Space.

getLocationLocal.information: Get the landmark XYZ location relative to Local Space.

Joint.information: Joints define the relationships and constraints between entities.

pivot.information: Constraint the rotation origin of entity B to entity A's landmark.

gearRatio.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B to be a percentage of entity A's

limitLocationXYZ.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitLocationX.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitLocationY.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitLocationZ.information: Constraint the translation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitRotationXYZ.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitRotationX.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitRotationY.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

limitRotationZ.information: Constraint the rotation of entity B, relative to entity A's landmark.

Material.information: Materials affect the appearance and simulation properties of the parts.

assignToPart.information: Assigns the material to a part.

setColor.information: Set the RGBA color of an entity. Supports 0-255 int or 0.0-1.0 float values.

addImageTexture.information: Add a texture from an image file.

default.information: Get an Animation instance for the current scene.

setFrameStart.information: Set the start animation frame in the scene.

setFrameEnd.information: Set the end animation frame in the scene.

setFrameCurrent.information: Set the current animation frame in the scene.

createKeyFrameLocation.information: Create an animation key-frame using the location of the entity.

createKeyFrameRotation.information: Create an animation key-frame using the rotation of the entity.

setColor.information: Set the color of an existing light.

translateXYZ.information: Translate in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

rotateXYZ.information: Rotate in the XYZ direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

delete.information: Delete the light from the scene.

getNativeInstance.information: Get the native API's object instance. For example, in Blender API, this would return a bpy.object instance.

getLocationWorld.information: Get the light XYZ location relative to World Space.

getLocationLocal.information: Get the light XYZ location relative to Local Space.

createPerspective.information: Create a perspective camera in the scene.

createOrthogonal.information: Create an orthogonal camera in the scene.

setFocalLength.information: Set the focal length of the camera.

translateXYZ.information: Translate in the XYZ directions. Pass a number, Dimension or Dimension-String (e.g. '2cm') to scale to a specific length.

rotateXYZ.information: Rotate in the XYZ direction. Default units is degrees. Pass in a number, Angle or Angle-String (e.g. 'PI/4radians' or 'PI/4r' or '90d'

delete.information: Delete the camera from the scene.

getNativeInstance.information: Get the native API's object instance. For example, in Blender API, this would return a bpy.object instance.

getLocationWorld.information: Get the camera XYZ location relative to World Space.

getLocationLocal.information: Get the camera XYZ location relative to Local Space.

Scene.information: Scene, camera, lighting, rendering, animation, simulation and GUI related functionality.

default.information: Get a Scene instance for the current scene.

export.information: Export the entire scene or specific entities.

setDefaultUnit.information: Set the document's default measurements system.

removeFromGroup.information: Removes an existing entity from a group

assignToGroup.information: Assigns an existing entity to a new group

setVisible.information: Change the visibiltiy of the entity.

setBackgroundImage.information: Set the scene background image. This can be an image or an HDRI texture.

Analytics.information: Tools for collecting data about the entities and scene.

getWorldPose.information: Returns the world pose of an entity.

getBoundingBox.information: Returns the bounding box of an entity.

getDimensions.information: Returns the dimensions of an entity.
